concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: Information on where everything is located in the kitchen.

conbody.p: Welcome mom and Armando! Please make yourself at home but make sure not to leave a huge mess! Everything you need, including pans and utensils, is located in the two drawers next to the fridge. The fresh ingredients are located in the fridge, where as the dry ingredients are stored inside the pantry by the window. When you are ready to wash the dishes, make sure you rinse the dishes before putting them in the dishwasher. The dishwasher is not powerful enough to scrub off crusty food on the plates or bowls. Lastly, the back left stove is not working so don't try to use that one, we're working on getting it repaired. I hope you guys enjoy these tasty breakfast recipes!
